attributes.action: For Schools to hold annual sports awards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I attended my sons sports awards last night and the school said it hoped to have 6 competitors for 2012, I thouth wow what if every school had a target or hope it would galvinise the nation and be in keeping with the bids ethos

Regards

Iain Starkey-Smith
